titles.title: Sweet Will Of God (jumps around a bit nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sweet will of God still fold me closer Till I am wholly lost in Thee Sweet will of God still fold me closer Till I am wholly lost in Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My stubborn will at last hath yielded I would be Thine and Thine alone And this the prayer my lips are bringing Lord let in me Thy will be done{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I'm tired of sin footsore and weary The darksome path hath dreary grown But not a light has ris'n to cheer me I find in Thee my Star my Sun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy precious will O conquering Savior Doth now embrace and compass me All discords hushed my peace a river My soul a prisoned bird set free{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shut in with Thee O Lord forever My wayward feet no more to roam What pow'r from Thee my soul can sever The center of God's will my home{/lang-eng}
